<title level="1" right="Rules">[Mountain](/Rules.aspx?ID=605)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 513 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
Mountain environments also include hills, which share many aspects of mountains, though not their more extreme features. The most common disasters here are avalanches.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
